snippet: Kim Jong-un was re-elected as head of his country’s top governing agency as its rubber-stamp Parliament met to help consolidate his power by filling top leadership posts vacated in recent purges.
abstract: North Korea’s leader Kim Jong-un is re-elected as head of his country’s top governing agency as its rubber-stamp Parliament meets to help consolidate his power by filling top leadership posts vacated in purges.
lead_paragraph: Kim Jong-un was re-elected as head of his country’s top governing agency as its rubber-stamp Parliament met to help consolidate his power by filling top leadership posts vacated in recent purges.

headline.main: Leader Tightens Hold on Power in North Korea
headline.print_headline: Leader Tightens Hold on Power in North Korea
